name: HoMM3 for VCMI in german
description:
Patch changes any Heroes3 complete localisation into german.
Based on german files found on https://www.mightandmagicworld.de/filebase/heroes_3_patches-c12/index.html files from 10.04.2018
 initial mod by magikyr
extended by anonymous
author: mightandmagicworld ported by magikyr extended by heroesiiifan

1.0.0: Initial release by magikyr (only txt-files and h3c campaign)
1.1.0: Complete rework with new maps, graphics and texts
